casebody.data:
658 A.2d 786 Dolores M. WAROS and the Regular Policemen of the Borough of Vandergrift, an Unincorporated Association, Appellants v. BOROUGH OF VANDERGRIFT, a Municipal Corporation. Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Argued March 9, 1995. Decided May 18, 1995. Rearguxnent Denied June 19, 1995.

Before, NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, GAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

ORDER

PER CURIAM:

Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.

ZARPALA, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.

MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
